title-group.article-title: In Search of Origins of Engine Noise — an Historical Review

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1981 Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: The paper traces from the introduction of the internal combustion engine the numerous attempts that have been made to understand the fundamental origins of noise. It relates the progress made from very early subjective assessments to the present day sophisticated experimental and theoretical analyses.

ref.mixed-citation: F. Sass, "Geschichte des Deutchen Verbrennungsmotoren-baues", Springer-Verlag, 1962.
